title: RED DEAD REDEMPTION AND UNDEAD NIGHTMARE
headline: RED DEAD REDEMPTION AND UNDEAD NIGHTMARE
subtitle: Coming to PlayStation 4 on August 17
content:
Experience the epic Western adventure Red Dead Redemption and its zombie-horror companion, Undead Nightmare, as both games come to PlayStation 4 for the very first time in a single package, bringing the two classic experiences together again for both new players and original fans to enjoy, including backwards compatibility with the PlayStation 5.

Add Red Dead Redemption to your wish list now on the PlayStation Store to receive a notification when it becomes available.
